io.vertx.up.commune

Interface Json

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    Api, Commercial, Record
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    Database, DictEpsilon, Integration, XHeader

    public interface Json

    Json data extract from object, there are three method for using 1) Json Data to T 2) Json File to T 3) T to Json

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods Default Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      default void fromFile(String jsonFile)
      Default implementation here File -> Json -> T
      void fromJson(io.vertx.core.json.JsonObject json)
      Json to T ( Pojo )
      io.vertx.core.json.JsonObject toJson()
      T to Json

    • Method Detail

      • toJson

        T to Json

        Returns:

      • fromJson

        Json to T ( Pojo )

        Parameters:

      • fromFile

        default void fromFile(String jsonFile)

        Default implementation here File -> Json -> T

        Parameters:
